Package Model.grid

Class Grid

java.lang.Object
Model.grid.Grid
public class Grid extends Object
Represents the grid on which the game is played.

  • Constructor Details

    • Grid

      public Grid(int size)
      Constructs a new grid of the specified size.
      Parameters:
      size - The size of the grid (size x size).

  • Method Details

    • initializeGrid

      private void initializeGrid()
      Initializes the grid by assigning ElementType.NOTHING as the element type and Player.NULL as the owner for each position.

    • getGrid

      public Position[][] getGrid()
      Gets the grid.
      Returns:
      The grid represented as a two-dimensional array of positions.

    • getPositionAt

      public Position getPositionAt(int x, int y)
      Gets the position at the specified coordinates.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.
      Returns:
      The position at the specified coordinates.

    • getPlayerShips

      public Position[] getPlayerShips(Player player)
      Gets the ships belonging to the specified player.
      Parameters:
      player - The player whose ships to retrieve.
      Returns:
      An array of positions representing the ships belonging to the player.

    • placeShip

      public void placeShip(int x, int y, Player owner)
      Places a ship at the specified coordinates for the specified owner.
      Parameters:
      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.
      owner - The owner of the ship.

    • placeGrenade

      public void placeGrenade(int x, int y, Player owner)
      Places a grenade at the specified coordinates for the specified owner.

      x - The x-coordinate.
      y - The y-coordinate.
      owner - The owner of the grenade.
